author: manfo2021
title: Dev Journey into DID/SSI* Paradigm
description: The change brought about by the DID paradigm is groundbreaking for conventional devs; at this stage practical use cases are not available.
solution: Design and implement project based dev training curriculum to allow developers to learn through creating real solutions that integrate DID.
experience: Wada Cameroon Hub: 3 Haskell/Closure/Java Senior Software Engineers and Architects (12+ years teaching experience) passionate about DID/SSI*
